name: IntergalacticScale
0:
”Alexa open Intergalactic Scale”
”What is my weight on Mars”
”How much would I weigh on the moon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: intergalactic scale
des: Intergalactic Scale converts your weight on Earth (in pounds) to weight on other planets in the solar system based on their gravity.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
